The forecast capital expenditure schedule was provided in real 2012 US$m. When calculating the tax asset schedule with tax depreciation using the diminishing value method at 40% per annum, the standard approach is to apply the depreciation on the real capex values without inflation adjustment, as tax depreciation tables and rates are generally based on the original cost (real terms).

The calculated closing balance for the taxation asset schedule in 2019, based on the real capex values and 40% diminishing value depreciation, is approximately 98.1m.
